did.abstract: This collection comprises the reports, memoranda, and lists, relating to administration and financial situation of a small forced labor camp Kedrovy Shor, a division of Intlag camp in the Soviet Union. The collection includes lists of salaries of guards, food and clothing distribution charts, food norms and rations, instructions.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: This collection comprises the reports, memoranda, and lists, relating to administration and financial situation of a small forced labor camp Kedrovy Shor, a division of Intlag camp in the Soviet Union. The collection includes lists of salaries of guards, food and clothing distribution charts, food norms and rations, instructions.

did.unittitle: Rates of income taxes and exemptions for camp's workers
Expenses reports, audits and sentences of fraudulent bookkeeping practices in Intlag camp, instructions and orders regarding financial activities, reports on living conditions and food distribution
Instructions regarding financial activities in Vorkuta camps, 1940
Financial settlements, reviews, and budget plans, lists of expenses
Instructions on food and clothing norms for the prisoners
Records of food distribution, list of wages and bonuses, name index cards, excerpts of judicial investigation of accounts, budget expenditure charts in Intlag labor camp
